reviewtext: This is the same lens that came on my 300 digital rebel that I bought about 10 years ago, shot about 40,000 photos with it, gave to my son and the shutter failed, sent to Canon and had it repaired and gave to my daughter. One of the lenses came loose in the old one but the price was really good and it worked for all that time so I replaced the original with another one just like it. It's cheap but it works much better than the price would indicated.
